name: The VR Girl
description:
The VR Girl is a tale about 2 programmers and a girl who comes to life inside a VR world. How she got there is unknown. 

The boys found an exceptional piece of code and copied it thinking it was a quick

win for their VR project.

Little did they know what was in store for them....

And for her......

Current Version is 1.1

Chapter 1 is complete

Chapter 2 ETA: When its ready

Chapter 3 ETA: When its ready
